mapper.sql: user_id, dept_id, login_name, user_name, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, password, salt, status, del_flag
mapper.select: Select dept_name FROM tbl_dept dt WHERE dt.dept_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_id, dept_id, login_name, user_name, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, password, salt, status, del_flag) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
